text:
Bridebook | London, UK | Full-Time | REMOTE

https://bridebook.co.uk

Bridebook is looking for 1x Front-end developer and 1x Full stack developer. We have a fully distributed development team. We use latest stack of React, Redux, Flow, Fela, Node/koa, AWS, firebase.

Front end dev needs a strong cssInJS experience Full stack dev needs a strong Node / microservices experience

Frontend Dev: bridebookcouk.homerun.co/ux-front-end-developer Full-Stack: bridebookcouk.homerun.co/full-stack-developer
